Text: Reserve Your Table OnlineIMAGE Let American ExpressR Online Restaurant Reservations seat you at some of the finest restaurants around the country without the hassle of booking by phone Your next reservation is just a click away at diningaexpemOLRR Youll get a full menu of benefits Reserve tables at hundreds of restaurants FREE hours a day without ever hearing busy signals or being put on hold Change or cancel reservations quickly and easily online Make special requests like a table by the window or a birthday dessert for a loved one Get email confirmations of all reservations changes and cancellations Use valuable Zagat SurveyR reviews to get the inside scoop from ratings to special features So find it and book it online with American Express Online Restaurant Reservations Your biggest problem will be saving room for dessert Click here to register online atdiningaexpemOLRR PS This email was sent to NRONCOM If you received this email at a different address this email message was forwarded If you do not wish to receive future email offers from American Express please hit the reply button and let us know by typing the word REMOVE and indicate this email address in the subject line Please visit the American Express Privacy Statement atprivacyaexpemOLRR to set review or change preferences regarding the type of emails you want to receive Copyright American Express Company All Rights Reserved
